name: Working Area Location Tracking
desc: A web based online mapping for tracking work station and working area through GIS. A project designed for BELA

name: Swamp Forest Digitization
desc: Digitization of Ratargul swamp forest for detecting forest degradation through satalite time frame imagary and integrated forest management.

name: Data Extraction from satallite
desc: Data extracted from multiple location points for machine learning training dataset to predict the solar energy generation potentials.

name: Machine Learning (ANN)
desc: Used 5 machine learning models to train and predict solar energy generation potential throughout the country. ANN has been the best model to give acceptable output.

name: GIS & ML integration
desc: Used Machine Learning models to interpolate solar energy potential in the GIS map for visualization.

name: Presentation Designing for Fiverr
desc: I have designed multiple presentions in Fiverr with minimulist mordern pitch-deck design.

name: Personal Portfolio
desc: I designed this portfolio completely using html, css and javascript with the help of AI inspired from GitHub.

name: Blogspot
